items.text: There is only one fielder in the deep on the leg side - and Anamul Haque hits it straight into the lap of that man. This was tossed up slower and higher outside off, he brings out the slog sweep again, makes good connection again, but finds the fielder this time. One shot too many? Anamul's mad dash is over
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Anamul Haque, OUT

dismissal.text: Anamul Haque c Ervine b Sikandar Raza 19 (14b 4x4 0x6) SR: 135.71

items.text: back of a length and angling away outside off, punched into the covers
items.shortText: Jarvis to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full and just a shade outside off, Tamim scoops a drive back to the bowler
items.shortText: Jarvis to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: attempted slower ball? Finishes on the hips, tucked away behind square for one
items.shortText: Jarvis to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: tip and run to mid-on for a single. That's the experience of Tamim. That's what Anamul should have done
items.shortText: Jarvis to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: back of a length and angling away outside off, Shakib can't resist a jab away from the body and nearly plays on
items.shortText: Jarvis to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.preText: TAMIM KABIR: "Anamul failed to capitalize on the good start he got.it would have been a great start for him after so many years if he could score a big one"
items.text: Shakib stretches out to meet this full ball on off. Push-driven to mid-off
items.postText: Irfan: "That's what I feared. Early wickets boost bowlers minds. Hope it doesn't turn into a dynamo effect."
items.shortText: Jarvis to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.preText: James: "This looks like an unusually competitive Tri Series, which has something in it for all the teams. Zimbabwe get competitive cricket, and the chance to record some wins over major nations, Bangladesh and Sri Lanka get the chance for some wins under the belt. Good work by the Bangladesh cricket board."
items.text: Tamim stays leg-side of this full ball on off and bunts a single to mid-off
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: back of a length offbreak outside off, Shakib goes deep in the crease and firmly punches to long-off
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: forced off the pads to midwicket as Raza keeps hitting those hard in-between lengths
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: flatter and skids on outside off, not quite short enough for a cut, Shakib slashes and misses
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: tossed up full on middle, pushed back to the right of the bowler
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: dropped short and wide outside off, Shakib picks the length and clunks it to cover-point, where the fielder dives to his right and fumbles
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs

items.text: good length and on middle stump, gently defended back to the bowler
items.shortText: Jarvis to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: attempted short ball, keeps low on middle, this shin-high ball is swatted out to deep square. Great adjustment from Tamim
items.shortText: Jarvis to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.text: floated full and outside off, forward and driven on the up to the covers
items.shortText: Jarvis to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: back of a length and angling away outside off, Tamim allows the ball to come to him, then whips it with the wrists to the right of deep midwicket
items.shortText: Jarvis to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.text: short and angling away outside off, keeps low again, Shakib can't slap it past the off-side infield
items.shortText: Jarvis to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText: Abdullah: "Very very stupid shot from Anamul. He's been out of the team since 2015, should have played sensible innings to solidify his position in the team, but no. Rash shot might cost him the squad place soon again in the future. "
items.text: whipped away to deep midwicket again
items.postText: Outkast: "Kyle Jarvis has never been and will never be a white ball bowler. One would expect Heath Streak to know that."
items.shortText: Jarvis to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: sliding down the leg side, past the sweep, past the keeper, rolls away for four wides
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, 5 wides

items.text: Tamim thrusts his bat in front of the pad and blocks this straight ball to the off side
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: this leg-stump ball is knocked through midwicket
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: full and darted on middle, tapped to mid-on
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: full on middle again, defended back to Raza
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: another leg-side wide, beats the sweep but not the keeper
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 wide
